author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added support for controlling which regression test files are run first by
A value of 'mtime' means testing the recently updated files first.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Changed the 'modifying operators' test to use str_number for output.
This ensures the same output for floating numbers across different PHP

author: sb:ez.no
msg: - Properly export ezcWorkflowNodeVariable* nodes to XML.
# No, I do not like large changesets such as this one.
